title: Community of Practice (CoP)-Based Learning Program for Developing Elementary Science Teaching Expertise

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of elementary science curriculum content and 3+ years of teaching experience
context.additional_context: Utilization of online collaboration tools (Padlet, Google Classroom, etc.) in digitally equipped environments

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three research-based science teaching strategies and apply them to lesson design.
Learners can provide feedback and propose two improvement strategies through peer classroom observations.
Learners can write a reflective science teaching report (5 pages) based on community of practice activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
